header.title: Mnesia Reference Manual
header.prepared: Håkan Mattsson, Hans Nilsson, Claes Wikström

description.p: Mnesia is a distributed DataBase Management System (DBMS), appropriate for telecommunications applications and other Erlang applications which require continuous operation and exhibit soft real-time properties.
